title: Gram - imperative - dic mihi - Ovid Heroides 2

content.description: Dic mihi, quid feci, nisi non sapientersapienter, adv.: wisely amavi?
content.question: In the sentence, what does the speaker tell her audience to do?

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
